QuestData.Title: Hold the Line
QuestData.Description: $n! I'm still not sure if you're alive or dead... human or worgen...$B$BI'm not even sure if I'm really awake. But THIS I am sure of...$B$BWe're going to kill a great many of these motherless Forsaken.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, $n! Just like old times...$B$BI'm going to have to work hard at not shooting you, but Krennan explained everything to us.
